incentives.description: Fuel economy inputs for MO m3

extra_copy.content: The first Model 3 configurator to enter production features a long range battery, rear wheel or all-wheel drive and premium upgrades throughout.
Long Range Battery - 498 kilometers EPA est.
Premium seating with 12-way power adjustable front seats
Centre console with covered storage, 4 USB ports and docking for 2 smartphones
Tinted glass roof with ultraviolet and infrared protection
Auto dimming, power folding, heated side mirrors
Basic maps with real-time traffic navigation
Satellite maps with real-time traffic navigation and view
Music & media via smartphone or in-car streaming
Over-the-air updates via Wi-Fi or cellular
Designed with aluminium alloy, for enhanced interior styling

extra_copy.content: Prices are without any potential savings compared to gasoline vehicles up to {SAVING_PRICE}.

The WLTP standard can be useful in comparing ranges among electric vehicles. Ranges listed as estimate or est., like those under wheel and seating selections, if available, are estimations based on your chosen configuration.

Actual range may vary based on factors such as speed, weather conditions and elevation change.
All cars have a power trunk, glass roof, and Autopilot.

Tesla designed Model 3 from the ground-up as an electric vehicle using system-level integration throughout. Each component, including batteries, motors and even exterior aerodynamics are optimized to benefit from one another and create one of the most efficient, yet unbelievably powerful vehicles ever built.
Premium audio with 13 speakers, 1 subwoofer, 2amps and immersive sound
Tinted glass roof with ultraviolet and infrared protection
Auto dimming, power folding, heated side mirrors
Wireless phone charging in center console
649 litres of cargo space including a secure front trunk
Heated Seats - All 5 seats with individual controls

The full Glass Roof gives passengers a brighter, more spacious experience and an expansive view of the sky. Infrared and UV light is effectively blocked before entering the cabin, reducing heat and glare even when the sun is directly overhead.

groups.name: Traffic Light and Stop Sign Control

extra_copy.content: Traffic Light and Stop Sign Control
Traffic Light and Stop Sign Control is designed to slowdown and stop for visible traffic lights or stop signs that are detected when Traffic-Aware Cruise Control or Autosteer is engaged.

Charge anywhere there is electricity. Most range used for daily driving can be topped off using the Mobile Connector Bundle and an approved outlet, or upgrade to a Tesla Wall Connector for the best home charging experience. For long distance travel, Model 3 adds up to 275 kilometres of range in just 15 minutes using Teslas Supercharger network, getting you back on the road, sooner.
Model 3 gets better over time with frequent wireless software updates, bringing you new features, more entertainment, higher performance and range, increased comfort and even better safety.
Remotely control and monitor your Tesla with Phone Key keyless driving, range & charging status, climate control, live GPS location and more.

Included with every Tesla, Autopilot enables your car to steer, accelerate and brake automatically for other vehicles and pedestrians within its lane. Advanced safety and convenience features are designed to assist you with the most burdensome parts of driving, alongside driver assistance features such as emergency braking, collision warning and blind-spot monitoring.

Access everything on the expansive 15-inch touchscreen including high-definition side and rearview camera views, navigation, movies, music, games and more. Your surroundings are visualized in real time while you drive to display speed limit signs, upcoming traffic control signals, pedestrians, cyclists and hazards in a 360-degree surround view.

The expansive Glass Roof provides passengers with a brighter, more spacious experience and a seamless view of the sky. Infrared and ultraviolet light is effectively blocked before entering the cabin, reducing heat and glare even when the sun is directly overhead.

Easily charge two phones at once on a non-slip, contoured surface. The integrated center console offers deep storage space with two front and two rear USB-C charging ports, and tiered storage under the armrest.

Softer than leather, yet far more durable and more stain-resistant, our custom-engineered seating material is fully vegan and significantly more sustainable than traditional seating materials, maximizing comfort and esthetics while maintaining our rigorous standards for durability and stain resistance.

Airflow and temperature are controlled entirely through the display, allowing precise direction without ever seeing or touching a physical vent. On hot days, Cabin Overheat Protection ensures interiors always stay cool. In cold weather, pre-conditioning automatically warms the cabin and prepares the cars battery to maximize range and efficiency.
Exclusive gray wheels designed with lightweight, yet tough aluminum alloy and Pirelli P Zero tires for ultimate driving control both on and off the track.
Larger, stiffer calipers and lightweight two-piece discs for enhanced performance and thermal capacity
Designed with aluminum alloy for enhanced interior styling
Optimized for enhanced aerodynamics and improved stability at high speeds. The Carbon Fiber Spoiler is accented by an exclusive Performance badge to create a distinctive rear fascia.

Updatable via over-the-air updates, Track Mode features increased powertrain cooling and regenerative braking for extended track sessions, uses the motors to get the car to turn-in, and allows drivers to customize driving modes to match their abilities and handling preference.

Automatic driving from highway on-ramp to off-ramp includes automatic lane changes, Traffic-Aware Cruise Control with complete stopping and re-engagement, Autosteer, and overtaking slow cars in your lane.

While driving on the highway, Automatic Lane Change will position your car in the optimal lane to prepare for merges and exits while overtaking slow cars. Drivers are given clear insight to upcoming lane changes as well as customization to Auto Lane Change functionality.

Park with ease in both parallel and perpendicular parking spaces with a single button tap on the Center Display. Model 3 will alert you to available parking spots by continuously monitoring the space around you.

Activated by the Tesla App, your parked car will come find you anywhere in a parking lot, and even park or unpark itself in tight spaces. Enhanced Summon navigates complex parking situations while abiding by lane markings and stop signs, avoiding pedestrians and obstacles like traffic cones, trash bins and rogue shopping carts.
Tesla-designed silicon optimized for computer vision enables detailed, onscreen environment visualization and eventual Full Self-Driving Capability through over-the-air software updates.
Emergency lane departure avoidance and correction
Model 3 includes Navigation on all models and a 30 day Premium Connectivity trial:
USB-A port in the glovebox with a 128GB portable storage device included
Tinted glass roof with ultraviolet and infrared protection
Power folding, auto-dimming, heated side mirrors
Center console with storage, 4 USB-C ports and wireless charging for 2 smartphones
Premium audio  13 speakers, 1 subwoofer, 2 amps, and immersive sound
USB-A port in the glovebox with a 128GB portable storage device included
Tinted glass roof with ultraviolet and infrared protection
Power folding, auto-dimming, heated side mirrors
Center console with storage, 4 USB-C ports and wireless charging for 2 smartphones

A unique layer of protection for Tesla vehicles continuously monitors the environment around the car when its left unattended. When enabled, Sentry Mode enters a Standby state, like many home alarm systems, which uses the cars external cameras to help detect and protect against potential threats.

Model 3 features 649 liters of cargo space accessible through both the front trunk and the automatically opening and closing rear trunk. Taking advantage of the space traditionally occupied by bulky engines, gas tanks and transmissions, the design of Model 3 enables disproportionately large amounts of storage for a car its size, while bolstering occupant safety through a more spacious, reinforced body and chassis.
Features subject to change and may vary based on hardware configuration. New features that become available after delivery may be subject to additional charges.
* Available on Wi-Fi only with Standard Connectivity

1. Standard connectivity is included, at no additional cost, for 8 years following the new vehicles original delivery. Certain high data usage vehicle features require at least Standard Connectivity, including maps, navigation and voice commands.
2. Premium Connectivity is complimentary for 30 days, then available as a subscription

1. Standard connectivity is included, at no additional cost, until {sc-duration}. Certain high data usage vehicle features require at least Standard Connectivity, including maps, navigation and voice commands.
2. Premium Connectivity is complimentary for 30 days, then available as a subscription.
Enables your car to steer, accelerate and brake automatically for other vehicles and pedestrians within its lane.

The currently enabled features require active driver supervision and do not make the vehicle autonomous. The activation and use of these features are dependent on achieving reliability far in excess of human drivers as demonstrated by billions of miles of experience, as well as regulatory approval, which may take longer in some jurisdictions. As these self-driving features evolve, your car will be continuously upgraded through over-the-air software updates.
Traffic Light and Stop Sign Control

The currently enabled features require active driver supervision and do not make the vehicle autonomous. The activation and use of these features are dependent on achieving reliability far in excess of human drivers as demonstrated by billions of miles of experience, as well as regulatory approval, which may take longer in some jurisdictions. As these self-driving features evolve, your car will be continuously upgraded through over-the-air software updates.
Autopilot is a pre-requisite for Full Self-Driving Capability and will be added to your cart for an additional price
Autopilot is a pre-requisite for Full Self-Driving Capability and will be added to your cart for an additional price
Autopilot is a pre-requisite for Full Self-Driving Capability; after you purchase Autopilot, your vehicle will be eligible for the Full Self-Driving Capability subscription.
A Full Self-Driving computer installation of ##cost## is required. Once the installation is complete, you will be eligible to subscribe.

By ##ACTION##, your saved payment method will be charged and auto-billed monthly. To learn more visit ##termsAndConditions##.

Full Self-Driving Capability Subscription can be cancelled anytime, however, they cannot be refunded. To learn more visit ##cancellationPolicy##.

If applicable, tax is calculated based on the address provided while placing an order.

The current Full Self-Driving features require active driver supervision and do not make the vehicle autonomous. The future use of these features without supervision is dependent on achieving reliability far in excess of human drivers as demonstrated by billions of miles of experience, as well as regulatory approval, which may take longer in some jurisdictions.
Autopilot is a pre-requisite for Enhanced Autopilot and will be added to your cart for an additional price
Larger, stiffer calipers and lightweight two-piece discs for enhanced performance and thermal capacity
*Available on Wi-Fi only with Standard Connectivity

extra_copy.content: Enhance your riding experience with rear heated seats and a heated steering wheel.
when all-wheel drive and standard battery options becomes available.

Electric dual redundant motors independently control torque to both front and rear wheels for more power and security. In the unlikely event that one motor stops working, you can rely on the second. The result is instant responsiveness and precise traction control, in all weather conditions.
Improve your 0-100 km/h acceleration from 4.4 seconds to 3.9 seconds.

$PRM30.name: Partial Premium Interior
$PRM30.description:
Upgrade your interior with additional features and premium materials.

  • Premium heated seating and cabin materials throughout, including open pore wood dcor, glass roof and four USB ports
  • 12-way power adjustable front seats, steering column and side mirrors, with custom driver profiles
  • Premium audio system with more power, tweeters, surround speakers and subwoofer

extra_copy.content: Our premium package adds upgraded features throughout Model 3
